articles.author: Jen Kirby
articles.title: Sen. Chris Murphy condemns “perverse secrecy of child separation”
articles.description: The Democratic lawmaker said he and his colleagues were barred from visiting a child separated from their family.

articles.author: by Decca Muldowney and Adriana Gallardo
articles.title: About the Immigrant Children Shelter Map
articles.description: by Decca Muldowney and Adriana Gallardo Leer en español. ProPublica found and mapped 97 facilities holding immigrant children, including shelters and foster care centers. As of June 26, 2,047 children remain separated from the parents who crossed the border w…
